summary: This document is an email chain from October 2021 regarding the purchase and installation of a new camera system at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) following the death of Jeffrey Epstein in August 2019. The correspondence involves a request for confirmation about the documentation and timeline of the camera system's arrival and installation, with a mention of the FBI attempting to retrieve information from recorders.

persons.name: Mr. MI
persons.context: Addressee of an email from the DOJ OIG Boston Area Office requesting confirmation about camera system documentation and installation timeline at the MCC following Epstein's death.

events.title: Epstein incident at MCC
events.description: The death of Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Installation of new camera system at MCC
events.description: A new camera system was installed at the MCC immediately after the Epstein incident on August 10, 2019.

events.title: Start of work related to camera system
events.description: Work started in May 2019, though the exact nature and dates are not clearly remembered by the correspondent.
